Comment: Here I make my first mistake. 4. e4 is the move bringing up the wall of pawns but my unfamiliarity with the opening is quickly exposed by an experience opponent. I think it is very important to be able to attack an opponent who strays from the standard line and the ability to do so separates those who have memorized opening move sequences from those who know and understand the opening in depth.
